description: Olympia`s Meowstic is one of the two Meowstic that Olympia has as her main partners. It battled against Ash`s Talonflame and Ash`s Frogadier in a double battle gym fight. Its Ability is Prankster which allows it to preemptively activate supporting moves such as Light Screen. That`s why it could protect the female before the attack from Ash and his Pok√©mon could hit.
name: Nyaonix (Gojika)
